V33 â€” Changelogs

Based on v417.0.0.0.53

ðŸ†• Added / Enabled
- Introduced the Story Peek feature with extended preview support.
- Introduced Stories rewatch count feature (not functional yet).
- Enabled carousel reorder functionality, including first-slide support.
- Enabled Reels Motion Photo feature with improved rendering.
- Enabled scrollable Stories post-caption toolbar with redesigned icons.
- Enabled Reels playback speed option in the overflow menu (not functional yet).
- Enabled pill-style UI for profile attributes.
- Enabled GIF and sticker replies in Stories.
- Enabled event creation from the DM overflow menu.
- Enabled Cubid effect and enhanced animations for AI voice sharing.
- Enabled Nearby lane in Reels.
- Enabled improved Story preview texture quality for sharper visuals.
- Added enhanced Stories auto-advance behavior for smoother playback.
- Improved emoji quick reaction responsiveness.
- Enabled improved Reels grid layout flexibility.

ðŸ”„ Updated / Improved
- Updated animations while generating AI content for smoother transitions.
- Refined the Homecoming UI and action bar behavior.
- Enhanced Stories viewer layout and tray behavior.
- Improved Stories tray seen-state handling and auto-scroll performance.
- Improved renderer performance and scroll smoothness.
- Updated Stories emoji reaction layout with improved responsiveness.
- Improved draft reliability and media loading transitions.
- Improved media rendering performance across Stories and Reels.
- Optimized background memory handling for better stability.
- Improved notification badge syncing and refresh behavior.
- Refined scroll-based animations for a smoother experience.
- Updated old flags and applied additional under-the-hood optimizations.

ðŸ›  Fixed
- Fixed text disappearing issue on Stories.
- Fixed glitches when opening someone's Story from DMs.
- Fixed Reels viewer not opening issue.
- Fixed Story skipping issues.
- Fixed multiple issues related to the Reels viewer layout and playback.
- Fixed several memory leak issues for improved stability.
- Fixed profile glitches when opening from group chats.
- Fixed missing format button issue in Notes.
- Fixed occasional spinner getting stuck on loading screens.
- Fixed layout inconsistencies in immersive reply surfaces.
- Fixed minor UI misalignment issues across feed and viewer screens.
